languages.text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has an increased chance of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
Using this ability removes any previous reinforcement.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Укрепляет выбранный {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}сектор щитов{/g} пустотного корабля. Укрепление действует до получения {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
Укрепленный сектор имеет больше шансов поглотить атаку противника и теряет только половину прочности при поглощении урона.
Использование этой способности нейтрализует предыдущие укрепления.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Reinforces a sector of the Flagship's shields until that sector suffers damage.
The reinforced sector has increased chances of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
Only one shield sector can be reinforced at a time.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random.</indent>

A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has an increased chance of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
Using this ability removes any previous reinforcement.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has an increased chance of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
Using this ability removes any previous reinforcement.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has an increased chance of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
Using this ability removes any previous reinforcement.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
Укрепляет выбранный {g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}сектор щитов{/g} пустотного корабля. Укрепление действует до получения {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
Укрепленный сектор имеет больше шансов поглотить атаку противника и теряет только половину прочности при поглощении урона.
Использование этой способности нейтрализует предыдущие укрепления.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>
languages.original_text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has increased chances of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
Using this ability removes previous reinforcements.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
Ein ausgewählter Sektor der {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Raumschilde{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} wird verstärkt, bis er {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet. Der verstärkte Sektor kann feindliche Angriffe mit erhöhter Wahrscheinlichkeit absorbieren und verliert beim Absorbieren von Schäden nur die Hälfte seiner Stärke. Der Einsatz dieser Fähigkeit entfernt frühere Verstärkungen.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: Zufällige Rundenanzahl <u>(1 bis 3)</u>.</indent>
languages.original_text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has an increased chance of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
Using this ability removes any previous reinforcement.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text: Ein ausgewählter Sektor der {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Raumschilde{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} wird verstärkt, bis er {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet. Der verstärkte Sektor kann feindliche Angriffe mit erhöhter Wahrscheinlichkeit absorbieren und verliert beim Absorbieren von Schäden nur die Hälfte seiner Stärke. Der Einsatz dieser Fähigkeit entfernt vorherige Verstärkungen. <indent=5%>Abklingzeit: Zufällige Rundenanzahl <u>(von 1 bis 3)</u>.</indent>

languages.text:
Un secteur choisi des {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} est renforcé jusqu'à ce qu'il subisse des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
Le secteur renforcé a plus de chances d'absorber les attaques ennemies et, ce faisant, ne perd que la moitié de sa force.
L'utilisation de cette capacité supprime les renforts précédents.
<indent=5%>Temps de recharge : <u>(de 1 à 3)</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>
languages.original_text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has an increased chance of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
Using this ability removes any previous reinforcement.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text: Un secteur choisi des {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} est renforcé jusqu'à ce qu'il subisse des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Le secteur renforcé a plus de chances d'absorber les attaques ennemies et ce faisant ne perd que la moitié de sa force. L'utilisation de cette capacité supprime les renforts précédents. <indent=5%>Délai de récupération : <u>(de 1 à 3)</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>

languages.text:
强化{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}的选定区域，效果持续至该区域承受{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}为止。
强化后的区域有更高几率吸收敌人的攻击，且吸收伤害时仅仅损失一半护盾强度。
再次使用此能力会移除之前的强化区域。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>
languages.original_text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has an increased chance of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
Using this ability removes any previous reinforcement.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
强化{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的某个护盾区域，直到该区域受到伤害为止。
强化后的区域有更高几率吸收敌人的攻击，吸收伤害时仅仅损失一半护盾强度。{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}{/g}
每次只能强化一个{g|Encyclopedia:ShieldSectorSpace}护盾区域{/g}。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}：随机一到三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>

languages.text:
Un sector elegido de los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} de vacío de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} queda reforzado hasta que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daños{/g}.
El sector reforzado tiene una probabilidad aumentada de absorber ataques y solo pierde la mitad de fuerza al absorber daños.
Usar esta capacidad anula cualquier refuerzo anterior.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>
languages.original_text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has an increased chance of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
Using this ability removes any previous reinforcement.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Un sector elegido de los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} de vacío de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} queda reforzado hasta que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daños{/g}.
El sector reforzado tiene una probabilidad aumentada de absorber ataques y solo pierde la mitad de fuerza al absorber daños.
Usar esta capacidad anula cualquier refuerzo anterior.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}ヴォイドシールド{/g}の選ばれたセクターが{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるまで強化される。
強化されたセクターは敵の攻撃を吸収する確率が増加し、ダメージを吸収する際に腕力の半分しか失わない。
なお、このアビリティを使用すると、それまでの強化は取り除かれる。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで<u>（1～3）</u>ラウンド。</indent>
languages.original_text:
A chosen sector of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} is reinforced until it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The reinforced sector has an increased chance of absorbing enemy attacks and loses only half of its strength when absorbing damage.
Using this ability removes any previous reinforcement.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}ヴォイドシールド{/g}の選ばれたセクターが{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるまで強化される。

なお、このアビリティを使用すると、それまでの強化は取り除かれる。
